full_output.summary: Proficient in Python and libraries such as Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-Learn, Matplotlib, and Seaborn. Experienced in data cleaning, predictive modeling, and creating insightful visualizations through academic projects and internships. Passionate about leveraging data to solve complex problems and eager to contribute to a dynamic, data-driven organization. Quick learner committed to continuous improvement and professional growth.

projects.name: Telecom Customer Churn Prediction
projects.description: Cleaned and preprocessed data using Pandas and NumPy, including handling missing values and encoding categorical variables. Developed a Decision Tree model for predicting customer churn, utilizing Scikit-Learn. Applied SMOTEEN to balance the dataset, improving model accuracy by 10%. Used Matplotlib and Seaborn to create visualizations for understanding customer behaviour and model performance.

projects.name: Library Management System (LMS)
projects.description: Created an LMS using Java NetBeans for efficient course management, student enrolment, and assessment tracking. Overcame scalability and user authentication challenges, ensuring a reliable educational platform. Utilized Java programming language and the NetBeans IDE to design and implement key features of the LMS. Designed a user-friendly interface with JavaFX, connected to MySQL using JDBC for database operations, and established smooth communication between the front-end and back-end with RESTful APIs. Optimizes system performance by 30% through code refactoring and database indexing. Implemented a user-friendly dashboard that resulted in a 20% increase in user engagement. Successfully integrated third-party authentication systems, improving security and user account management.
